page.title: 11THE NEW MARKET: BROWNHILLS.
page.content: The new market opened on Tuesday 23rd April 1985. This is part of the proposed development of Brownhills. People interviewed generally commented favourably. In particular they preferred the new, flat tarmac surface to the old mud one. This has made it easier to walk through the market. The new car park was also seen as an improvement, reducing congestion in the High Street. People showed approval of the new layout and thought that it would bring more trade to Brownhills. However, traders were more cautious. Some were pleased with their new positions, eg. near an entrance, but others were less happy. Many preferred not to express an opinion until they were able to compare their sales over a period of time.
